tests: INSERT INTO qa_result (run_id, assertion_id, concept_id, details)
SELECT <RUNID>, '<ASSERTIONUUID>', d.conceptid, concat('Current concept (', c.id, ') with "due to" in term not modelled on the attribute "Due to": ', term
AND  lower(term) NOT LIKE '%not due to%'
assertionText: Current concept  with "due to" in term not modelled on the attribute "Due to"
shortName: due to in term modelled as due to
docRef: SNOMED CT Style Guide: Clinical Findings Section 2.6.2 Due to
